    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        public Properties getProperties()
        Return the Properties object that was used to initialize this instance of the 'PaperIndexer' object.
        Returns:

      • buildStopwordList

        protected static List<String> buildStopwordList(String stopwordFileName)
        Builds a list of stopwords from a specified stop file path (each line being a stopword in the file). These words are not stored in the index and hence are not used for similarity computation.
        Parameters:
        stopwordFileName - The relative path name to the stopword file.
        Returns:
        A list of the stopword terms read from the file.

      • constructAnalyzer

        public static org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer constructAnalyzer(String stopFileName)
        Constructs a Lucene 'Analyzer' object. The analyzer object used currently in the code flow is the 'EnglishAnalyzer' that stems words in addition to removing stopwords.
        Parameters:
        stopwordFileName - The relative path name to the stopword file.
        Returns:
        An EnglishAnalyzer object.

      • analyze

        public static String analyze(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer,
                             String text)
        Constructs an analyzed (pre-processed) string after removing stopwords and stemming each constituent word of a given string.
        Parameters:
        analyzer - The analyzer object that is to be used to perform pre-processing.
        text - The string that is to be analyzed.
        Returns:
        A pre-processed string.

                     throws Exception
